heading: Salford Shots
introduction: A few of my favourite pictures around Salford, Greater Manchester.
promo-image-alt: A patch of flowers, with a softly blurred medieval English building obscured in the background

images.alt: A strikingly red bridge on a sunny day.
Two of the BBC buildings at MediaCityUK.
A patch of trees and bushes besides a turn in a river.
The Imperial War Museum North in snowy weather.
A patch of flowers, with a softly blurred medieval English building obscured in the background
